title: I have to rename myself again :/
body:
So I joined a team and now I have to put the team tag before my name and it's too long. I'm thinking of changing my name to:
4L I Really A

Cos it's Irelia. Get it?

replies.body: 4LLLLissandra. that's all I've seen you play.

I always consider the in name tag to be ridiculous.
Especially considering that you end up with the team tag in your name twice when you play team matches together.
What I think is just don't. People with team tags often look silly in games where it isn't a five-person premade.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ytmrEWfA,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2014-12-17T21:47:06.187+0000)
>
> What I think is just don't. People with team tags often look silly in games where it isn't a five-person premade.

Not if the team is any good.
They should change their name to TSM Irelia.

I sent you a friend request...
Did you reject me? :(
I used to not accept people but I'll just do it until my friends list is full. I'll add you again
Doesn't the tag already apply in game?
It looks more professional so it doesn't matter

But will you still really Irelia? {{champion:39}} {{item:3070}}

EDIT: Just keep same summoner icon then its cool :^)
